sentences.en: Caveat Emptor, buyer beware, is a salutary reminder to any purchaser.
sentences.cn: “买主各自小心”, 这是对任何买主的有益提示.

sentences.en: Every purchaser of a pound of coffee received a box of cookies as a bonus.
sentences.cn: 每买一磅咖啡的人都得到一盒免费奉送的饼干.

sentences.en: He has not yet given possession to the purchaser.
sentences.cn: 他还没把所有权移交给买主.

sentences.en: He shall forthwith notify the Purchaser In Writing of the suspension.
sentences.cn: 他应立即书面通知买方其延迟行为.

sentences.en: Support Purchaser and QA to develop and evaluate the new supplier.
sentences.cn: 协助采购和质量保证工程师开发验证新供应商.

sentences.en: Support Purchaser and QA to do annual quality audit.
sentences.cn: 协助采购和质量保证工程师对供应商的年度质量审核.

sentences.en: The company hade find a purchaser for its warehouse.
sentences.cn: 公司已经找到了愿意购买其仓库的买主.

sentences.en: The price must be legible to a purchaser.
sentences.cn: 价格要写得清楚些,让买家一眼能辨认出.

sentences.en: The purchaser is required to possess shanghai household registration.
sentences.cn: 使用权房屋,购买者必须持有上海户口.

sentences.en: The purchaser is the primary actor.
sentences.cn: 购买者是主要的参与者。

sentences.en: The purchaser must ultimately ensure that there is a high-quality computer component.
sentences.cn: 购买者最终一定要确保计算机里面是高质量的部件。

sentences.en: The purchaser of the house will pay the deposit next week.
The purchaser of this automobile is protected by the manufacturer's warranty.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车的买主可以得到厂方保单.

sentences.en: The Purchaser shall bear all costs of taking - over tests.
sentences.cn: 买方应承担验收测试的所有成本.

sentences.en: The territory was too expensive for any purchaser, so the two couples parceled out a picnic lunch.
sentences.cn: 这地方什么都贵, 因此,两对夫妇分享一顿野餐.

sentences.en: Until revocation, the purchaser is entitled to collect the assigned claims.
sentences.cn: 除非门拓另外通知, 买方有义务接收债权.

sentences.en: What if we focus on the purchaser not the user ( or vice versa ) ?
sentences.cn: 如果我们将聚焦集中在现有使用者里的 先驱者,会有什么样的结果?
